                               java.lang.Object object)
        Method to save Objects on a obj File
        Parameters:
        path - path of the obj file
        object - object to be stored
        Returns:
        true in case of success, false otherwise

      • loadElections

        public static java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<Election<? extends Person>> loadElections​(java.lang.String dirPath)
        Method to load all elections from an obj file
        Parameters:
        dirPath - path to the obj file
        Returns:
        CopyOnWriteArrayList with all elections

      • loadData

        public static java.lang.Object loadData​(java.lang.String path)
        Method to load an Object from a obj file
        Parameters:
        path - path to the obj file
        Returns:
        true if data is loaded from the files, false otherwise

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main static method - Instance of a RMI Server Controls Failover, STONITH and the RMI itself
        Parameters:
        args - socket: arg#1 = IP | arg#2 = port | arg#3 = database directory
